item.title: Haakon Sheffield
item.description:
Norwegian - American
Favorite US race: Green Mountain Stage Race
Favorite pro race to watch: de Ronde Van Vlaanderen (Tour of Flanders)
Type of rider: Rouleur, Domestique
Favourite Ride: any long day of hard work in the saddle. My favorite three climbs are the Pas de lâ€™Escous (Sospel), Hwy 39 - Dawson Saddle (Los Angeles), Tryvann (Oslo).
